title: Ole And Zac And The Port Of Tumbattle
description: Ole And Zac And The Port Of Tumbattle tells the tale of two small boys who go off in search of adventure. They hitch a ride on the back of a turtle on their way to the port of Tumbattle, where pirates once fought, and sabres once rattled, and they meet a host of pirates and several strange creatures as they look for lost treasure. Most of the illustrations inside this book are the work of primary school children, particularly those at Taxal & Fernilee C Of E Primary School and Chinley Primary School. The cover illustrations are the work of Paul Buckley.
author: Michael Anthony Madden
